K10samyu_wu:1: 4. athāyuṣmān pūrṇiko 'ciraprakrāntān saṃbahulān anyatīrthikaparivrājakān viditvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopajagāma. upetya bhagavatpādau śirasā vanditvā,
K10samyu_wu:2: ekānte nyaṣīdat. ekāntaniṣanna āyuṣmān pūrṇiko yāvad evāsyābhūt. saṃbahulair anyatīrthikaparivrājakaiḥ
K10samyu_wu:3: sārdham antarākathāsamudāhāras tat sarvaṃ bhagavato vistareṇārocayati. evaṃ cāha.
K10samyu_wu:4: 5. kaccid ahaṃ bhadanta evaṃ vyākurvāṇo no ca bhagavantam abhyācakṣe. nātisarāmy
K10samyu_wu:5: uktavādī cāhaṃ bhagavato dharmavādī ca dharmasya cānudharmaṃ vyākaromi. na ca me
K10samyu_wu:6: kaścid āgacchet parataḥ saha dharmeṇa vādānuvādaṃ garhasthānīyo dharmaḥ.
K10samyu_wu:7: 6. tatthyaṃ tvaṃ pūrṇika vyākurvāṇo no ca mām abhyācakṣase. nātisarāsy uktavādī ca
K10samyu_wu:8: tvaṃ mama dharmavādī ca dharmasya cānudharmaṃ vyākarosi. na ca te kaścid āgacchet
K10samyu_wu:9: parataḥ saha dharmeṇa vādānuvādaṃ garhasthānīyo dharmaḥ /
K10samyu_wu:10: 7. tat kasmād dhetoḥ. pūrvaṃ pūrṇika ......... anabhisamayāt* śvāṃtrakulajātā guḍaguṃjijātā
K10samyu_wu:11: muṃjabalbajajātā ājavaṃjavasamāpannā asmāl lokāt paraṃ lokaṃ parāl lokād imaṃ lokaṃ
K10samyu_wu:13: 8. mithyāmāneṣu pūrṇika ....... apariśeṣam adhyastaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet sarvasyāḥ prajāyā dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya //
K10samyu_wu:15: 1. bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe. athāyuṣmān ānandaḥ sa rātryā
K10samyu_wu:16: paścime yāme vyutthāya yena nadī tapodā tenopajagāma. upetya nadyās tapodāyās tīre
K10samyu_wu:17: cīvarakāṇy upanikṣipya nadīṃ tapodām abhyavagāhya gātrāṇi pariṣicya nadīṃ tapodāṃ pratyutthāya,
K10samyu_wu:19: 2. tena khalu samayena kokanadaḥ parivrājako yena nadī tapodā tenopajagāma. aśrauṣīd
K10samyu_wu:20: āyuṣmān ānandaḥ kokanadasya parivrājakasya pariṣiñcanaśabdam. śrutvā ca punar āyuṣmatānandenotkāśanaśabdaḥ
K10samyu_wu:21: kṛtaḥ. aśrauṣīt kokanadaḥ parivrājako tasyotkāśanaśabdaṃ. śrutvā ca punar evam āha.
K10samyu_wu:22: 3. ko 'sy āyuṣman. ahaṃ śramaṇo 'smi. katameṣāṃ śramaṇānām. śākyaputrīyāṇām. pṛccheyam
K10samyu_wu:23: aham āyuṣmāṃ kañcid eva pradeśāmi saced avakāśaṃ kuryāḥ praśnasya vyākaraṇāya. pṛcchāyuṣman.
K10samyu_wu:25: 4. kin nv āyuṣman bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt. avyākṛtaṃ bhagavatā bhavati tathāgataḥ
K10samyu_wu:26: paraṃ maraṇāt. kin nv āyuṣman na bhavati bhavati ca na bhavati naiva bhavati naiva
K10samyu_wu:27: na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt. avyākṛtaṃ bhagavatā na bhavati bhavati ca na
K10samyu_wu:28: na bhavati naiva bhavati naiva na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt.
K10samyu_wu:29: 5. kin nv āyuṣman bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇād iti pṛṣṭa avyākṛtam iti vadasi.
K10samyu_wu:30: na bhavati bhavati ca na na bhavati naiva bhavati naiva na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ
K10samyu_wu:31: maraṇād iti pṛṣṭaḥ avyākṛtam iti vadasi. kinv āyuṣman na jānāsi na paśyasi. nāham
K10samyu_wu:32: āyuṣman na jānāmi na paśyāmi. jānāmy ahaṃ paṣyāmi. kin nv āyuṣman jānāsi paśyasi.
K10samyu_wu:33: 6. ........ dṛṣṭir dṛṣṭisthānaṃ dṛṣṭisthāna ...... tam ahaṃ jānāmi tam ahaṃ paśyāmi. evaṃ cāham āyuṣman jānāmy evaṃ paśyāmi. kin nv ahaṃ na jānāmi na paśyāmi.
K10samyu_wu:34: 7. ko nāmāyuṣmaṃ. ānanda iti. āścaryaṃ yāvan mahācāryasya śrāvakeṇa sārdham antarākathāsamudāhāraḥ.
K10samyu_wu:35: saced ahaṃ sañjānīyām āyuṣmān ānanda iti etāvat pratibhāsya na haṃta bh. ...... evam uktvā prakrāntaḥ //
K10samyu_wu:37: 1. // bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme. tena khalu samayena
K10samyu_wu:38: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir divāditaḥ śrāvastyā niṣkramati bhagavaddarśanāya bhagavantaṃ paryupāsanāyai.
K10samyu_wu:39: 2. athānāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapater etad abhavat*. atiprātas tāvad etarhi bhagavaddarśanāya
K10samyu_wu:40: bhagavantaṃ paryupāsanāyai. bhagavāñ ca bhikṣavaś ca pratisaṃlīnā bhavanti. yan nv
K10samyu_wu:43: upetyānyatīrthikaparivrājakaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ kathāṃ vividhān upasaṃhṛtya,
K10samyu_wu:45: 4. athānyatīrthikaparivrājakā idam avocan. gṛhapate śramaṇasya gautamasya dṛṣṭiṃ
K10samyu_wu:46: vadasi. kā gautamasya dṛṣṭiḥ kiṃ paśyati gautamaḥ. nāham api bhavanto jānāmi kā bhagavato
K10samyu_wu:47: dṛṣṭiḥ kiṃ paśyati bhagavāṃ. tena hi gṛhapate bhikṣusaṃghasya dṛṣṭiṃ vadasi. kā bhikṣusaṃghasya
K10samyu_wu:48: dṛṣṭiḥ kiṃ paśyati bhikṣusaṃghaḥ. nāham api bhavanto jānāmi kā bhikṣusaṃghasya dṛṣṭiḥ
K10samyu_wu:49: kiṃ paśyati bhikṣusaṃghaḥ. tena hi gṛhapate kā gṛhapater dṛṣṭiḥ kiṃ paśyati gṛhapatir.
K10samyu_wu:50: aṅga bhavantas tāvat* svakasvakāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ vyākurvantu. paścān mama dṛṣṭiṃ vyākarotuṃ
K10samyu_wu:53: dṛṣṭiḥ śāsvato loka idaṃ satyaṃ moham anyat. apara evam āha mama dṛṣṭiṛ aśāśvato
K10samyu_wu:54: loka idaṃ satyaṃ mohaṃ anyat* apara evam āha śāśvataś cāśāśvataś ca loka. apara evam
K10samyu_wu:55: āha naiva śāśvato nāśāśvataś ca lokaḥ. antavān lokaḥ. anantavān. antavāṃś cānantavāṃś
K10samyu_wu:56: ca. naivāntavāṃ nānantavāṃ. yo jīvas tac charīram. anyo jīvo 'nyac charīram. bhavati
K10samyu_wu:57: tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt. na bhavati. bhavati ca na bhavati ca. apara evam āha mama
K10samyu_wu:58: dṛṣṭir naiva bhavati naiva na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt. idaṃ satyaṃ moham anyat.
K10samyu_wu:59: 6. athānyatīrthikaparivrājakā anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam avocan* vyākurvāma vayaṃ gṛhapate svakasvakāṃ dṛṣṭim. vyākarotu gṛhapate kā gṛhapater dṛṣṭiḥ kiṃ paśyati gṛhapatir.
K10samyu_wu:60: 7. mama bhavanto dṛṣṭir bhūtaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ cetayitaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ yad bhūtaṃ
K10samyu_wu:61: saṃskṛtaṃ cetayitaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ tad anityaṃ yad anityaṃ tad duḥkhaṃ. evaṃ
K10samyu_wu:62: viditvā tasmād aham imāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ nābhyupagatam.
K10samyu_wu:63: 8. ........ dṛṣṭiḥ śāśvato loka idaṃ satyaṃ moham anyat. imā dṛṣṭir bhūtaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ
K10samyu_wu:64: cetayitaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ yad bhūtaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ cetayitaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ
K10samyu_wu:65: tad anityaṃ yad anityaṃ tad duḥkham. tasmād ayam āyuṣmāṃ duḥkham evālīnaḥ. duḥkham
K10samyu_wu:66: evādhyupagataḥ. duḥkham evādhiniviṣṭaḥ. duḥkham eva pratipannaḥ.
K10samyu_wu:67: 9. ............ evaṃvādī śāśvato loka idam eva satyaṃ moham anyat. evṃ doṣaṃ bhavati. pūrvavad yāvat,
K10samyu_wu:68: naiva bhavati naiva na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt. idaṃ satyaṃ moham anyat*
K10samyu_wu:69: imā dṛṣṭir bhūtaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ cetayitaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ yad bhūtaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ cetayitaṃ
K10samyu_wu:70: pratītyasamutpannaṃ tad anityaṃ yad anityaṃ tad duḥkhaṃ. tasmād ayam āyuṣmāṃ duḥkham
K10samyu_wu:71: evālīnaḥ. duḥkham evādhyupagataḥ. duḥkham evādhiniviṣṭaḥ. duḥkham eva pratipannaḥ.
K10samyu_wu:72: ............ evaṃvādī naiva bhavati naiva na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt. idaṃ satyaṃ moham anyat.
K10samyu_wu:74: gṛhapater api dṛṣṭir bhūtaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ cetayitaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ yad bhūtaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ
K10samyu_wu:75: cetayitaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ tad anityaṃ yad anityaṃ tad duḥkhaṃ. tasmād gṛhapatir
K10samyu_wu:76: api duḥkham evālīnaḥ duḥkham evādhyupagataḥ. duḥkham evādhiniviṣṭaḥ. duḥkham eva pratipannaḥ.
K10samyu_wu:77: 11. mama bhavanto dṛṣṭir bhūtaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ cetayitaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ yad bhūtaṃ
K10samyu_wu:78: saṃskṛtaṃ cetayitaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ tad anityaṃ yad anityaṃ tad duḥkhaṃ. evaṃ
K10samyu_wu:79: viditvā tasmād aham imāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ nābhyupagatam. evam eva gṛhapate.
K10samyu_wu:80: 12. athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir anyatīrthikaparivrājakānām ārāme paraprativādāṃ nigṛhya svakaṃ vādaṃ dīpayitvā pariṣadi siṃhanādaṃ naditvā,
K10samyu_wu:81: utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ. athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir yena bhagavāṃs tenopajagāma.
K10samyu_wu:82: upetya bhagavatpādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte nyaṣīdat. ekāntaniṣaṇṇo 'nāthapiṇḍado
K10samyu_wu:83: gṛhapatir yāvad evāsyābhūt. saṃbahulair anyatīrthikaparivrājakaiḥ sārdham antarākathāsamudāhāras
K10samyu_wu:85: 13. evam ukto bhagavān anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat*. sādhu sādhu gṛhapate kālena kālaṃ ..........
K10samyu_wu:87: 1. // bhagavāṃ rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe. atha dīrghanakhaḥ parivrājako
K10samyu_wu:88: yena bhagavāṃs tenopajagāma. upetya bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃraṃjanīṃ
K10samyu_wu:90: ekānte nyaṣīdad. ekāntaniṣaṇṇo dīrghanakhaḥ parivrājako bhagavantam idam avocat.
K10samyu_wu:91: 2. sarvaṃ me bho gautama na kṣamati. eṣāpi te,
K10samyu_wu:92: agnivaiśyāyana dṛṣṭir na kṣamati yeyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sarvaṃ me na kṣamati,
K10samyu_wu:94: yeyaṃ me dṛṣṭiḥ sarvaṃ me na kṣamati.
K10samyu_wu:96: evaṃ jānata evaṃ paśyato 'syāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati pratiniḥsargo vyantibhāvaḥ,
K10samyu_wu:97: anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisandhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ. api me bho gautama,
K10samyu_wu:98: evaṃ jānata evaṃ paśyato 'syāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati pratiniḥsargo vyantibhāvaḥ,
K10samyu_wu:99: anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisandhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ.
K10samyu_wu:103: evaṃvādī. tvam api syāt tādṛśa eva ye kecid agnivaiśyāyana śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā
K10samyu_wu:104: imāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ pratiniḥsṛjanty anyāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ nopādante. ima ucyante śramaṇā vā
K10samyu_wu:106: 5. traya ime, agnivaiśyāyana dṛṣṭisaṃniśrayāḥ. katame trayaḥ. ihāgnivaiśyāyana,
K10samyu_wu:107: eka evaṃdṛṣṭir bhavati. evaṃvādī. sarvaṃ me kṣamati. punar aparam ihaika evaṃdṛṣṭir bhavati,
K10samyu_wu:108: evaṃvādī. sarvaṃ me na kṣamati. punar aparam ihaika evaṃdṛṣṭir bhavati,
K10samyu_wu:109: evaṃvādī. ekatyaṃ me kṣamati. ekatyaṃ me na kṣamati.
K10samyu_wu:110: 6. tatrāgnivaiśyāyana yeyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sarvaṃ me kṣamati. iyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ saṃrāgāya saṃvartate
K10samyu_wu:111: nāsaṃrāgāya saṃdveṣāya nāsaṃdveṣāya saṃmohāya nāsaṃmohāya saṃyogāya nāsaṃyogāya saṃkleśāya
K10samyu_wu:115: 7. yeyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sarvaṃ me na kṣamati. iyaṃ dṛṣṭir asaṃrāgāya saṃvartate na saṃrāgāya. asaṃdveṣāya na saṃdveṣāya,
K10samyu_wu:121: 8. tatrāgnivaiśyāyana yeyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ ekatyaṃ me kṣamati. ekatyaṃ me na kṣamati yat
K10samyu_wu:122: tāvad asya kṣamati tat saṃrāgāya saṃvartate nāsaṃrāgāya pūrvavad yāvad adhyavasānāya
K10samyu_wu:123: saṃvartate yad asya na kṣamati tad asaṃrāgāya saṃvartate na saṃrāgāya pūrvavad yāvad
K10samyu_wu:125: 9. tatra śrutavān āryaśrāvaka itaḥ pratisaṃśikṣati. ahaṃ ced evaṃdṛṣṭiḥ syām evaṃvādī sarvaṃ me kṣamati,
K10samyu_wu:126: dvābhyāṃ me sārdhaṃ syād vigrahaḥ syād vivādaḥ. yaś caivaṃdṛṣṭir evaṃvādī sarvaṃ me na kṣamati. yaś caivaṃdṛṣṭir evaṃvādī,
K10samyu_wu:129: vigrahe sati vivādo vivāde sati vihiṃsā. iti sa vigrahaṃ ca vivādaṃ ca vhiṃsāñ ca
K10samyu_wu:130: samanupaśyann imāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ pratinisṛjaty anyāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ nopādatte. evam asyāś
K10samyu_wu:131: ca dṛṣṭer prahāṇaṃ bhavati pratiniḥsargo vyantibhāva anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisandhir
K10samyu_wu:134: ahaṃ ced evaṃdṛṣṭiḥ syām evaṃvādī sarvaṃ me na kṣamati,
K10samyu_wu:135: dvābhyāṃ me sārdhaṃ syād vigrahaḥ syād vivādaḥ. yaś caivaṃdṛṣṭir evaṃvādī sarvaṃ
K10samyu_wu:136: me kṣamati. yaś caivaṃdṛṣṭir evaṃvādī. ekatyaṃ me kṣamati. ekatyaṃ me na kṣamati.
K10samyu_wu:137: vigrahe sati vivādo vivāde sati vihiṃsā pūrvavad yāvad apratisandhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ.
K10samyu_wu:142: dvābhyāṃ me sārdhaṃ syād vigrahaḥ syād vivādo yaś caivaṃdṛṣṭir evaṃvādī sarvaṃ me
K10samyu_wu:143: kṣamati yaś caivaṃdṛṣṭir evaṃvādī sarvaṃ me na kṣamati. vigrahe sati vivādaḥ pūrvavad
K10samyu_wu:145: 12. ayaṃ khalv agnivaiśyāyana kāyo rūpī audārikaś cāturmahābhūtika āryaśrāvakeṇa,
K10samyu_wu:146: abhīkṣaṇam anityānupaśyinā vihartavyam vyayānupaśyinā virāgānupaśyinā nirodhānupaśyinā
K10samyu_wu:148: virāgānupaśyino nirodhānupaśyinaḥ pratiniḥsargānupaśyino viharato yo 'sya bhavati
K10samyu_wu:149: kāye kāyacchandaḥ kāyasnehaḥ kāyapremā kāyālayaḥ kāyaviṣaktiḥ kāyādhyavasānaṃ tac
K10samyu_wu:151: 13. tisra imā agnivaiśyāyana vedanāḥ. katamās tisraḥ. sukhā vedanā duḥkhā vedanā,
K10samyu_wu:152: aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā ca. itīmās tisro vedanāḥ kiṃnidānāḥ kiṃsamudayāḥ kiṃjātīyāḥ kiṃprabhavāḥ.
K10samyu_wu:153: itīmā vedanā sparśanidānāḥ sparśasamudayāḥ sparśajātīyāḥ sparśaprabhavās tasya tasya
K10samyu_wu:154: sparśasya samudayāt tās tā vedanāḥ samudayanti. tasya tasya sparśasya nirodhāt tās
K10samyu_wu:155: tā vedanā nirudhyante vyupaśamanti śītībhavanti astaṃgacchanti.
K10samyu_wu:156: 14. sa yāṃ kāṃcid vedanāṃ vedayati sukhāṃ vā duḥkhāṃ vā,
K10samyu_wu:157: aduḥkhāsukhāṃ vā tāsāṃ vedanānāṃ samudayaṃ cāstaṃgamaṃ cāsvādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca niḥsaraṇaṃ
K10samyu_wu:158: ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāmīti. sa tāsāṃ vedanānāṃ samudayam cāstaṃgamaṃ cāsvādaṃ cādīnavaṃ
K10samyu_wu:159: ca niḥsaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānaṃ tāsu utpannāsu vedanāsv anityānupaśyī viharati
K10samyu_wu:161: 15. sa kāyaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedayānaḥ kāyaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedayāmīti yathābhūtaṃ
K10samyu_wu:162: prajānāti. jīvitaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedayāno jīvitaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedayāmīti
K10samyu_wu:163: yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. bhedāc ca kāyasyordhvaṃ jīvitaparyādānād ihaivāsya sarvāṇi
K10samyu_wu:164: vedayitāny apariśeṣaṃ nirudhyante. apariśeṣam adhyastaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti.
K10samyu_wu:165: 16. tasyaivaṃ bhavati sukhām api vedanāṃ vedayāno bhedāt kāyasya bhaviṣyati,
K10samyu_wu:166: eṣa evānto duḥkhasya. duḥkhām apy aduḥkhāsukhām api vedanāṃ vedayāno bhedāt kāyasya bhaviṣyati,
K10samyu_wu:167: eṣaivānto duḥkhasya. sa sukhām api vedanāṃ vedayati visaṃyukto vedayati na saṃyuktaḥ.
K10samyu_wu:168: duḥkhām apy aduḥkhāsukhām api vedanāṃ vedayati visaṃyukto vedayati na saṃyuktaḥ.
K10samyu_wu:169: kena visaṃyuktaḥ. visaṃyukto rāgeṇa dveṣeṇa mohena visaṃyukto jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhyo
K10samyu_wu:171: 17. tena khalu samayenāyuṣmāñ chāriputro 'rdhamāsopasaṃpanno bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ
K10samyu_wu:172: sthito 'bhūd vyajanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavantaṃ vījayan. athāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitad
K10samyu_wu:173: abhavat. bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇam eva varṇayati virāgam eva nirodham eva
K10samyu_wu:174: pratiniḥsargam eva varṇayati. athāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaiṣāṃ dharmāṇām anityatānupaśyinaḥ
K10samyu_wu:177: 18. dīrghanakhasya ca parivrājakasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam.
K10samyu_wu:178: atha dīrghanakhaḥ parivrājako dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā
K10samyu_wu:179: tīrṇakāṃkṣas tīrṇavicikitso 'parapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ śāstuḥ śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāpta
K10samyu_wu:180: utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat*.
K10samyu_wu:181: 19. labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam.
K10samyu_wu:182: careyam ahaṃ bhagavato 'ntike brahmacaryaṃ. labdhavāṃ dīrghanakhaḥ parivrājakaḥ svākhyāte
K10samyu_wu:183: dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam. evaṃ pravrajitaḥ sa āyuṣmāṃ yasyārthe
K10samyu_wu:184: kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayāgārād
K10samyu_wu:185: anagārikāṃ pravrajanti. pūrvavad yāvad arhan babhūva suvimuktacittaḥ.
K10samyu_wu:189: 1. // bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe. tena khalu samayena tasmin
K10samyu_wu:190: rājagṛhe śarabho nāmaḥ parivrājakaḥ prativasati sumāgadhāyāḥ puṣkaraṇyās tīre. .......
K10samyu_wu:191: sa evaṃ pariṣadi vācaṃ bhāṣate. ājñāto me śramaṇānāṃ śākyaputrīyāṇāṃ dharmaḥ. ājñāyaivāhaṃ
K10samyu_wu:193: 2. atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhne nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya
K10samyu_wu:194: prāviśan. aśrauṣuḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavo rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya carantaḥ. asmiṃ rājagṛhe
K10samyu_wu:195: śarabho nāmaḥ parivrājakaḥ prativasati. sa evaṃ pariṣadi vācaṃ bhāṣate. pūrvavat.
K10samyu_wu:196: śrutvā ca punar rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyāḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātaḥ
K10samyu_wu:197: pratikrāntāḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśamya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃs tenopajagmuḥ.
K10samyu_wu:198: upetya bhagavatpādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte nyaṣīdan. ekāṃtaniṣaṇṇāḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavo
K10samyu_wu:200: 3. iha vayaṃ bhadanta saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ
K10samyu_wu:201: piṇḍāya prāviśāma. aśrauṣma vayaṃ saṃbahulā bhikṣavo rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya carantaḥ.
K10samyu_wu:202: asmiṃ rājagṛhe śarabho nāmaḥ parivrājakaḥ prativasati. sa evaṃ pariṣadi vācaṃ bhāṣate.
K10samyu_wu:203: pūrvavat. sādhu bhagavān yena sumāgadhāyāḥ puṣkaraṇyās tīraṃ tenopasaṃkrameta anukampām
K10samyu_wu:204: upādāya. adhivāsayati bhagavān saṃbahulānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ tūṣṇīṃbhavena.
K10samyu_wu:205: 4. atha bhagavān sāyāhne pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya yena śarabhaḥ parivrājakaḥ sumāgadhāyāḥ
K10samyu_wu:206: puṣkaraṇyās tīre tenopajagāma. adrākṣīc charabhaḥ parivrājako bhagavantaṃ dūrata
K10samyu_wu:207: eva. dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhagavato 'rthāyāsanaṃ prajñapayaty evaṃ cāha. niṣīdatāṃ bhagavān
K10samyu_wu:208: prajñapta evāsane. nyaṣīdad bhagavān prajñapta evāsane. niṣadya bhagavāṃ śarabhaṃ
K10samyu_wu:211: evaṃ vadasi. ājñāto me śramaṇānāṃ śākyaputrīyāṇāṃ dharmaḥ. ājñāyaivāhaṃ tasmād dharmavinayād apakrānta.
K10samyu_wu:212: 6. evam uktaḥ śarabhaḥ parivrājakaḥ tūṣṇīm evābhūt. ........ tvaṃ śarabha kim asi
K10samyu_wu:213: tūṣṇīṃ. sacet te paripūrṇaṃ bhaviṣyati vayam anumodayiṣyāmaḥ. sacet te aparipūrṇaṃ
K10samyu_wu:214: bhaviṣyati vayaṃ te paripūrṇayiṣyāmaḥ. apīdānīṃ śarabhaḥ parivrājako ..... tūṣṇīm
K10samyu_wu:215: evābhūt. dvir api trir api śarabhaḥ parivrājakaḥ tūṣṇīm evābhūt.
K10samyu_wu:216: 7. atha śarabhasya parivrājakasya svakāḥ sabrahmacāriṇaḥ śarabhaṃ parivrājakam idam
K10samyu_wu:217: avocan. yad eva tvaṃ śramaṇaṃ gautamam upasaṃkramyeyaiva tad eva te śramaṇaḥ gautama
K10samyu_wu:218: upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vadati vyākuru vyākuru ... sacet te paripūrṇaṃ bhaviṣyati vayam
K10samyu_wu:219: anumodayiṣyāmaḥ sacet te aparipūrṇaṃ bhaviṣyati vayaṃ te paripūrṇayiṣyāmaḥ. tvaṃ
K10samyu_wu:220: śarabha kim asi tūṣṇīṃ. ... apīdānīṃ śarabhaḥ parivrājako ... tūṣṇīm evābhūd dvir
K10samyu_wu:221: api trir api śarabhaḥ parivrājakaḥ tūṣṇīm evābhūt.
K10samyu_wu:222: 8. atha bhagavān śarabhaṃ parivrājakam idam avocat. yo me saced evaṃ vadet,
K10samyu_wu:223: na śramaṇasya gautamasya tathāgataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas. tam ahaṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca samanuyuñjyāṃ samanugāhyāṃ. tasya sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca samanuyuñjyamānasya
K10samyu_wu:224: anyenānyaṃ pratisareta bahirdhā ... kopaṃ ca doṣaṃ cāpratyayaṃ ca prāduṣkuryāt. ... tūṣṇīṃbhūto vā syān madgubhūtaḥ srastaskandhaḥ,
K10samyu_wu:225: adhomukho niṣpratibhānaḥ pradhyānaparamaḥ tadyathā tvam etarhi śarabha.
K10samyu_wu:226: 9. yo me saced evaṃ vadet* na śramaṇasya gautamasya dharmavinayaḥ,
K10samyu_wu:227: tam ahaṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca samanuyuñjyāṃ samanugāhyāṃ. pūrvavad yāvat tadyathā tvam etarhi śarabha. yo me saced evaṃ vadet,
K10samyu_wu:229: tam ahaṃ sādhu ca suṣṭḥu ca samanuyuñjyāṃ samanugāhyāṃ pūrvavat* yāvat tadyathā tvam etarhi śarabha. ...
K10samyu_wu:230: 10. atha bhagavān sumāgadhāyāḥ puṣkaraṇyās tīre pariṣadi samyaksiṃhanādaṃ naditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ.
K10samyu_wu:231: 11. atha śarabhasya parivrājakasya svakāḥ sabrahmacāriṇaḥ śarabhaṃ parivrājakam idam
K10samyu_wu:232: avocan*. tadyathā śarabha. ṛṣabhaś chinnaviṣāṇaḥ śūnyāyāṃ gośālāyāṃ mahānādaṃ naditavyaṃ manyeta,
K10samyu_wu:233: evam eva tvam anyatra śramaṇād gautamāt pariṣadi siṃhanādaṃ naditavyaṃ manyase. tadyathā
K10samyu_wu:234: śarabha bhaḍḍalikā puṃrutakaṃ raviṣyāmīti bhaḍḍalikārutakam eva ravati. ... na bhaḍḍalikāvad
K10samyu_wu:235: asi .. tvam anyatra śramaṇād gautamāt pariṣadi siṃhanādaṃ naditavyaṃ manyase. tadyathā
K10samyu_wu:236: śarabha śṛgālo bheraṇḍākāravitakaṃ v. raviṣyāmīti śṛgālaravitakaṃ ravati. evam eva
K10samyu_wu:237: tvam anyatra śramaṇād gautamāt pariśadi siṃhanādaṃ manyase.
K10samyu_wu:238: 12. atha śarabhasya parivrājakasya svakāḥ sabrahmacāriṇaḥ ... cotthāyāsanāt prakrāntāḥ. śarabha iti sūtraṃ //
K10samyu_wu:240: 1. // bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe. tena khalu samayena tasmin
K10samyu_wu:241: rājagṛhe pīṭho nāmaḥ parivrājakaḥ prativasati sumāgadhāyāḥ puṣkariṇyās –hier immer
K10samyu_wu:242: puṣkaraṇyās erg.– tīre. sa evaṃ pariṣadi vācaṃ bhāṣate. ... yo me sacet tāṃ gāthāṃ
K10samyu_wu:243: gītam anugāsyati tasyāham antike brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyāmīti.
K10samyu_wu:244: 2. atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāviśan. aśrauṣuḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavo rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya carantaḥ,
K10samyu_wu:245: asmiṃ rājagṛhe sumāgadhāyāḥ puṣkaraṇyās tīre pīṭho nāmaḥ parivrājakaḥ prativasati.
K10samyu_wu:246: sa evaṃ pariṣadi vācaṃ bhāṣate. pūrvavat. ekānte nyaṣīdan. ekāntaniṣaṇṇāḥ saṃbahulā
K10samyu_wu:248: 3. iha vayaṃ bhadanta pūrvavat. adhivāsayati bhagavān saṃbahulānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ tūṣṇīṃbhavena.
K10samyu_wu:249: 4. atha bhagavān sāyāhne pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya yena pīṭhaḥ parivrājakaḥ sumāgadhāyāḥ
K10samyu_wu:250: puṣkaraṇyās tīre tenopajagāma. adrākṣīt pīṭhaḥ parivrājako bhagavantaṃ dūrata eva.
K10samyu_wu:251: dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhagavato 'rthāyāsanaṃ prajñapayaty evaṃ cāha. niṣīdatāṃ bhagavān
K10samyu_wu:252: prajñapta evāsane. nyaṣīdad bhagavān prajñapta evāsane. niṣadya bhagavāṃ pīṭhaṃ parivrājakam idam avocat.
K10samyu_wu:254: evaṃ vadasi. ... yo me sacet tāṃ gāthāṃ gītam anugāsyati tasyāham antike brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyāmīti. .. ahaṃ tāṃ gāthāṃ gītam anugāsyāmi.
K10samyu_wu:255: 6. atha pīṭhaḥ parivrājakāḥ pīṭhasyopari pīṭhaṃ ... tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ babhāṣe //
K10samyu_wu:258: 7. atha bhagavāṃ cetasā pīṭhasya parivrājakasya cittam ājñāya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ babhāṣe //
K10samyu_wu:261: yasya kāyena vācā ca manasā nāsti duṣkṛtam*
K10samyu_wu:263: 8. atha pīṭhasya parivrājakasya etad abhavad iti me śramaṇo gautamaś cetasā cittam ājānāti. ... yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat.
K10samyu_wu:264: 9. labheyāhaṃ bho gautama svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam.
K10samyu_wu:265: labdhavāṃ te svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam. evaṃ pravrajitaḥ
K10samyu_wu:266: sa pīṭhaḥ parivrājakaḥ yasyārthe kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy
K10samyu_wu:267: ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayāgārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti. pūrvavad yāvad arhan babhūva
K10samyu_wu:270: 1. // bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe. atha saṃbahulānāṃ brāhmaṇaparivrājakānāṃ
K10samyu_wu:271: sumāgadhāyāḥ puṣkariṇyās tīre sanniṣaṇṇānāṃ sannipatitānām ayaṃ evaṃrūpo 'bhūd antarākathāsamudāhāra
K10samyu_wu:272: ity api brāhmaṇasatyāni. ity api brāhmaṇasatyāni.
K10samyu_wu:273: 2. aśrauṣīd bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ saṃbahulānāṃ brāhmaṇaparivrājakānāṃ sumāgadhāyāḥ puṣkariṇyās
K10samyu_wu:274: tīre sanniṣaṇṇānāṃ sannipatitānām ayam evaṃrūpo 'bhūd antarākathāsamudāhāro divāvihāropagato
K10samyu_wu:275: divyena śrotreṇa viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa. śrutvā ca punar yena sumāgadhāyāḥ puṣkariṇyās tīraṃ tenopajagāma.
K10samyu_wu:276: 3. adrākṣuḥ saṃbahulā brāhmaṇaparivrājakā bhagavantaṃ dūrata eva. dṛṣṭvā ca punar
K10samyu_wu:277: bhagavato 'rthāyāsanaṃ prajñapayanty evaṃ cāhur. niṣīdataṃ bhagavān prajñapta evāsane.
K10samyu_wu:278: nyaṣīdad bhagavān prajñapta evāsane. niṣadya bhagavān saṃbahulān brāhmaṇaparivrājakān idam avocat.
K10samyu_wu:279: 4. kā nu yuṣmākaṃ saṃbahulānāṃ brāhmaṇaparivrājakānāṃ sumāgadhāyāḥ puṣkariṇyās tīre
K10samyu_wu:280: sanniṣannānāṃ sannipatitānām antarākathā viprakṛtā. kayā cātha kathayaitarhi sanniṣaṇṇāḥ
K10samyu_wu:281: sannipatitāḥ. ihāsmākaṃ bho gautama saṃbahulānāṃ brāhmaṇaparivrājakānāṃ sumāgadhāyāḥ
K10samyu_wu:282: puṣkariṇyās tīre sanniṣaṇṇānāṃ sannipatitānām ayam evaṃrūpo 'bhūd antarākathāsamudāhāra
K10samyu_wu:283: ity api brāhmaṇasatyāni. ity api brāhmaṇasatyāni. iyam asmākaṃ bho gautama saṃbahulānāṃ
K10samyu_wu:284: brāhmaṇaparivrājakānāṃ sumāgadhāyāḥ puṣkariṇyās tīre sanniṣaṇṇānāṃ sannipatitānām
K10samyu_wu:285: antarākathā viprakṛtā. tayā ca bho gautama kathayaitarhi sanniṣaṇṇāḥ saṃnipatitāḥ
K10samyu_wu:286: 5. trīṇi imāni brāhmaṇasatyāni. yāni mayā svayam abhijñāya sākṣīkṛtvopasaṃpadya praveditāni. katamāni trīṇi.
K10samyu_wu:287: 6. brāhmaṇā evam āhuḥ. sarve prāṇino 'vadhā iti vadamānā brāhmaṇāḥ satyam āhur na
K10samyu_wu:288: mṛśā. śreyāṃsaḥ sma iti manyante sadṛśā sma iti manyante hīnā sma iti manyante yad
K10samyu_wu:289: atra satyaṃ tad anabhiniveśya sarvaloke maitrāsahagatena cittena viharanti. idaṃ
K10samyu_wu:290: prathamaṃ brāhmaṇasatyaṃ yan mayā svayam abhijñāya sākṣīkṛtvopasaṃpadya praveditaṃ.
K10samyu_wu:291: 7. brāhmaṇā evam āhuḥ. yat kiṃcit samudayadharmaṃ sarvaṃ nirodhadharmakam iti vadamānā
K10samyu_wu:292: brāhmaṇāḥ satyam āhur na mṛśā. pūrvavad yāvad iti yad atra satyaṃ tad anabhiniviśya
K10samyu_wu:293: sarvaloke udayavyayānudarśino viharaṃti. idaṃ dvitīyaṃ brāhmaṇasatyaṃ yan mayā svayam
K10samyu_wu:295: 8. brāhmaṇā evam āhur. na mama kvacana kaścana kiñcanam asti nāsya kvacana kaścana
K10samyu_wu:296: kiñcanam astīti vadamānā brāhmaṇāḥ satyam āhur na mṛśā. pūrvavad yāvad iti yad atra
K10samyu_wu:297: satyaṃ tad anabhiniviśya sarvaloke amamāyanto viharaṃti. idaṃ tritīyaṃ brāhmaṇasatyaṃ
K10samyu_wu:298: yan mayā svayam abhijñāya sākṣīkṛtvopasaṃpadya praveditaṃ.
